q: former Dick Armey Jim Ryun , R-Kansas, offered his help in collecting signatures from conservatives and tea party activists to encourage Mike Pence to get into the race. Mike Pence thanked those who had encouraged him, but added: While we may have been able to seek the presidency, we believe our best opportunity to continue to serve the conservative values that brought us to public life is right here in Indiana. But it would have been an uphill climb. No sitting member of the House of Representatives has won the presidency since James Garfield in 1880. And he's been mired in the bottom of polls

Google's Eric Schmidt Sees` Bubble' Google has made 87 acquisitions worth$ 8.4 billion in the last 10 years, but the recent high valuations placed on some high-profile Internet companies has Eric Schmidt scratching his head. There are clear signs of a bubble, Mr. Eric Schmidt told the Swiss magazine Bilanz.`` But valuations are what they are.'' in a 2003 national security meeting when he was told that Saddam Hussein was offering a$ 60 million bounty to kill Donald Rumsfeld 's daughters.`` I was concerned,'' Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News on Tuesday. Of course the president and his family had secret service protection. My family did not. And it was a somewhat awkward moment in the meeting, he said. The plot also targeted President Bush 's two daughters, Donald Rumsfeld said, and President Bush urged him to take it seriously because the administration had killed Saddam Hussein 's sons.
